H0.text: In the Bible to whom did God give the Ten Commandments. Abraham

H1.text: In the Bible to whom did God give the Ten Commandments. Noah

H2.text: In the Bible to whom did God give the Ten Commandments. Joshua

H3.text: In the Bible to whom did God give the Ten Commandments. Mōšé

A4.text: Moses led the Israelites to Mount Sinai, where he was given the Ten Commandments from God, written on stone tablets.
